Package com.shopwiki.roger.rpc

Interface Summary
PostProcessors.PostProcessor Create implementations for any actions you want taken after each request is handled.
RequestHandler<I,O> This interface is left for the user to implement.
RpcServer.QueueDeclarator No implementation is required.
RpcServer.WorkerFactory Used by RpcServer to create RpcWorkers.
 

Class Summary
BasicWorkerFactory Basic implementation of RpcServer.WorkerFactory.
ExceptionResponse Used by RequestConsumer to format an Exception and its stack trace as JSON.
PostProcessors A collection PostProcessors.PostProcessors to be run in RequestConsumer after each request is handled.
RequestConsumer<I> Implementation of RabbitMQ's Consumer interface.
RpcClient<O> Mainly for testing a RpcServers.
RpcResponse<T> Used by RpcClient to conveniently bundle the headers & body of an RPC response.
RpcServer The main entry point for creating & starting an RPC server using Roger.
RpcTest  
RpcWorker A glue class that packages together a RequestHandler and the RabbitMQ plumbing needed to use it.
 

Enum Summary
ResponseStatus Response codes used by RequestConsumer.
 

Exception Summary
NackException A special Exception type a user may throw in their RequestHandler if they wish for a RequestConsumer to nack a request.
